name: Instantánea de lo transcurrido
description:
This work started my "Purge" series, which is really always open and in motion. That is why the palette is so different from the other works. More luminous, trying to accentuate the coloration in the skin, and in an elongated format that seemed right for the image.

Oil on canvas
Dimensions: 1512 x 3994 px
Size: 44 x 116 cm
